sentences.en: Cabbage is related to mustard, turnip turnips, care kale and colletscollards.
sentences.cn: 卷心菜与芥菜 、 大头菜 、 甘蓝、羽衣甘蓝同属.

sentences.en: He was caricatured as a turnip.
sentences.cn: 在漫画里他被画成了一棵大头菜。

sentences.en: Little animals are coming. They to up the turnip together.
sentences.cn: 小动物们来了, 他们要一起拔罗卜呢.

sentences.en: Peel and wash the carrot and turnip, then cut into sections.
sentences.cn: 青、红萝卜刮皮洗净, 切件备用.

sentences.en: Put the pork and dry turnip slices on the pumpkin.
sentences.cn: 把萝卜和肉片铺在南瓜上.

sentences.en: Scatter the uncooked turnip pieces over the spinach, then scatter the leeks.
sentences.cn: 把切好的生甘蓝片放到菠菜上, 然后撒上青蒜.

sentences.en: Spinach, egg - plant, cabbage, cauliflower, cucumber and turnip are our favorite vegetables.
sentences.cn: 菠菜, 茄子, 卷心菜, 花椰菜, 黄瓜,和萝卜都是我们喜欢吃的蔬菜.

sentences.en: Steamed buns with turnip seedlings as stuffing are very delicious.
sentences.cn: 用鸡毛菜包的包子是很好吃的.

sentences.en: The turnip provides nutrition for our body.
sentences.cn: 芜青为我们的身体提供营养。

sentences.en: The turnip provides nutrition for you.
This is turnip soup, made from real turnips.
sentences.cn: 这是大头菜汤, 用真正的大头菜做的.

sentences.en: Turnip green vegetables, each love somewhat!
sentences.cn: 萝卜青菜, 各有所爱嘛!

sentences.en: Two strains of turnip mosaic virus were identified on rape in Kiangsu.
sentences.cn: 江苏省为害油菜的?菁花叶病毒有黄斑及枯斑两个.

sentences.en: Wow! The turnip is so big. Is this a root, Mr. Li?
sentences.cn: 哇! 好大的萝卜. 这是根吗, 李老师?

trans.tran_cn: 芜青，萝卜，芜菁作物，<俚>怀表
trans.tran_en: a large round pale yellow vegetable that grows under the ground, or the plant that produces it
